EmailTemplate.subject: EMC World - A Pivotal Thanks
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for visiting Pivotal during EMC World! We were excited to showcase our technology, at the nexus of PaaS, Big Data and Agile software development for you.
For more information about the solutions we demonstrated, please go to: Pivotal Big Data Suite <http://www.gopivotal.com/big-data/pivotal-big-data-suite>, Business Data Lake, Pivotal CF <http://www.gopivotal.com/platform-as-a-service/pivotal-cf>, Pivotal HD <http://www.gopivotal.com/big-data/pivotal-hd> & HAWQ. <http://www.gopivotal.com/sites/default/files/Hawq_WP_042313_FINAL.pdf>
Pivotal is proud to be part of the EMC Federation <http://emcfederation.com/> of companies and EMC World was the premier event for IT and business professionals to meet and collaborate around EMC technologies. Certainly, all the hands-on product demos, technical sessions, and networking made coming all the way to Las Vegas worth it.
Check out Pivotal news @ EMC World on the Pivotal P.O.V. Blog:
- EMC World 2014: Pivotal and Isilon Take Hadoop Prime Time in the Enterprise <http://blog.gopivotal.com/pivotal/products/emc-world-2014-pivotal-and-isilon-take-hadoop-prime-time-in-the-enterprise> - Federation @ Work: Pivotal CF Running on VMware vCloud Hybrid Service <http://blog.gopivotal.com/cloud-foundry-pivotal/products/federation-work-pivotal-cf-running-on-vmware-vcloud-hybrid-service>
If you would like to learn more about Pivotal and how to become a great software company, please visit us at goPivotal.com <http://www.gopivotal.com/>.
Thanks The Pivotal Team
